Content: Old Royalists Union of Piliyandala, responding positively to a request, made by Major General Darshana Hettiarachchi, Commander, Security Forces - Jaffna donated a stock of school accessories to 125 students at Nelliadi Central College on the National Independence Day (4 Feb). To coincide with the National Independence Day, 4 Sri Lanka Sinha Regiment (SLSR) troops of the 551 Brigade under the 55 Division took the initiative of organizing the donation programme in close contact with school authorities. Colonel Asanka Perera, 551 Brigade Commander as the Chief Guest, together with representatives of the sponsors and Lieutenant Colonel Pinsara Wickramarachchi, Commanding Officer 4 SLSR attended the donation programme.
